issuetype.description: An improvement or enhancement to an existing feature or task.
issuetype.name: Improvement

fields.description: Since the recent conda-forge compiler migrations the wheel builds are failing https://mail.google.com/mail/u/0/#label/ARROW/FMfcgxwHNCsqSGKQRMZxGlWWsfmGpKdC
fields.summary: [Python] Switch to VS2017 in the windows wheel builds

comments.body: According to discussion we keep VS2015 for now.
